name: Batting Practice VR
description:
A VR Baseball Batting Simulation.  Go for distance, try not get a foul or strike.  2 handed bat that works for either hand. Use room scale or thumbstick teleporting to position yourself on Homeplate.  For Oculus Rift (should work for HTC  Vive. Index isn't fully set up yet, sorry)

Feb. 13th 2021  Update

1.2 update: Added background noise, fixed false Foul Bug, and changed VR hands.
